studentHours.note: Student hours are scheduled through Eagle Connect. Please check the Eagle Connect calendar for current availability.
studentHours.schedulingInstructions: To schedule an appointment, log into My Mendo, go to the Student Resources card, and click on Eagle Connect.

communicationPolicy.urgentMatters: Use Eagle Connect 'Raised Hand' feature for urgent academic support needs

eagleConnect.description: This course is part of the Eagle Connect Student Success Network. I will use Eagle Connect to schedule student office hours and communicate about your academic progress.
eagleConnect.studentInstructions: Throughout the term, you may receive notifications regarding your attendance and academic performance. Check your Eagle Connect Dashboard or school email regularly and follow through on recommended actions.
eagleConnect.accessInstructions: To access Eagle Connect, log into My Mendo, go to the Student Resources card, and click on Eagle Connect. You can set up a student profile and use the 'Raised Hand' feature to connect with campus services privately.
